name: Evilution
description:
Evilution

Made in 8 days for GoGodotJam3.

The Story

You play as an evil lich, whom has uncovered a source of unlimited magical power in an abandoned temple.
The heroes of the realm aren't fond of this discovery, and have set out to stop you...

Themes
  • Too much Power: If the lich stores too much power, the lich quickly loses health.
  • Evolution: The lich's power evolves over time, getting ever stronger
